abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Industrial Credit Project
            will (i) provide much needed medium- and long-term credit
            for financially and economically sound industrial investment
            projects of small- and medium-sized enterprises; (ii) help
            to develop a system for the generation of sound industrial
            investment projects; (iii) upgrade the project appraisal and
            supervision capabilities of PIs, as well as FONDEI's
            administration; (iv) strengthen CDI's lending
            capabilities and technical assistance services to smaller
            industrial enterprises. A total of about 4,200 new jobs are
            expected to be generated at an average investment cost per
            job of about US$11,300.
